message:
Hi Bob,

Iâ€™m excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to purchase this exceptional product for $10,000. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe this price reflects a great deal for both of us. Let me know your thoughts!

Best,
David
Hi David, thanks for the offer. I appreciate you considering my budget.  While the product is interesting, I'm only able to offer $9000 at this time.  Let me know your thoughts.

Hi Bob,

Thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest! While I understand your budget, I can go down to $9,500. I believe this is a fair price for the value the product brings. Let me know what you think!

Best,
David
